title: I Met the Beatles - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/18/21
itunes:title: I Met the Beatles - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/18/21
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and an open lines caller recount several encounters she had with Paul McCartney and the other Beatles in her native England before the band reached worldwide stardom, and how she even inspired him to write a song about her.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
